pullRequest.title: [Docs][SIEM]Adds ml rule prerequisites
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds ml rule creation requirements to the Detections prerequisites as users are having trouble finding this info.
Preview

nodes.bodyText:
While this is listed under "To create and modify detection rules..." I worry that it might be confusing to call out creation specifically here. I would recommend changing it to either:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
